name_ru: Макро для лешмейкеров — Шиммер вокруг глаза
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as ultra-realistic macro of the eye area. PRESERVE: Original framing and composition. Eyelashes: pixel-identical — no modification whatsoever, no shimmer particles on lashes. Eyebrows: pixel-identical — no change to shape, color, density. Iris and eye shape: unchanged. Skin tone: preserved from original. SKIN: Natural texture with visible pores, vellus hair, freckles preserved. No smoothing, no blurring, no cosmetic filter. ADD: Ultra-fine cosmetic micro-shimmer on skin around the eye only (upper lid, under-eye area, temple, upper cheekbone). Shimmer must be delicate, semi-transparent, light-catching — not glittery, not metallic, not dense. Elegant editorial finish. Do not darken the image. QUALITY: Professional macro lens, high detail, realistic skin texture. Luxury cosmetic editorial processing. Original dimensions.
